Public Attributes

int img [6]
 array of images that compose the panorama (in order: up, down, left, right, front, back).

float size
 size of each image.

flyVector color
 color applied to the images.

Detailed Description

Background panorama class.

This class implements a panorama made of six images that form a background box surrounding the level.
